static_container.label: Static Container
static_container.desrc: Shared containers, any flag can be submitted

static_attachment.label: Static Attachments
static_attachment.desrc: Commit attachments, any flag can be submitted

dynamic_container.label: Dynamic Container
dynamic_container.desrc: Auto-generate settlement flag, unique to each team

dynamic_attachment.label: Dynamic Attachments
dynamic_attachment.desrc: Distribution of annexes by team requires that the number of attachments is greater than the number of teams
